basics.name: Hung Vuong
basics.label: Fullstack Developer
basics.summary: With over 2 years of expertise in developing and constructing website applications, I have actively contributed to both in-house projects and outsourced initiatives. I have been an integral part of diverse teams, ranging from small to large, handling substantial workloads to deliver high-quality products tailored to meet business requirements. My enthusiasm for programming is evidenced by continuous research into frameworks aimed at elevating code quality and refining my skills. I possess a proactive approach, adapting swiftly to new projects and offering technical solutions to address challenges. Whether working independently from remote locations or within an office environment, I consistently demonstrate adaptability and a commitment to delivering results.

work.name: DSOFT Software
work.summary: Contributed to the ongoing project by both maintaining existing modules and developing new ones. Collaborated closely with Business Analysis teams to address issues and validate their requirements. Provided support to internal teams in feature development, while also enhancing code quality.

work.name: TMA Solutions
work.summary: Gathered and validated bug reports from QC teams. Collaborated with the internal team to review and address bug tickets while maintaining the source code of the project. Assumed a leadership role in the team, identifying and resolving performance issues, and implementing solutions to optimize the user interface.

work.name: TMA Solutions
work.summary: Developed reusable components utilizing AngularJS and the Razor Engine (.NET Core) for comprehensive project integration. Implemented an organized structure in the presentation layer of the project. Identified and resolved issues within the business and framework layers, concurrently enhancing the overall code quality.

work.name: TMA Solutions
work.summary: Managed and designed additional stored tables within the existing database, concurrently crafting SQL queries to facilitate seamless interaction with data and generate comprehensive statistics. Implemented a file management system on the Amazon server, leveraging the existing REST API server, and further enhanced various modules throughout the entire project.

work.name: VietInfo Corp
work.summary: Constructed a reusable theme in preparation for upcoming projects. Engineered DotNetNuke templates and streamlined the project's organizational structure. Collaborated with team leaders to assess and verify UI-related issues, providing insightful recommendations and implementing effective solutions for their resolution.

education.institution: Nam Ky Khoi Nghia St., Dist. 3

skills.name: Technologies & Frameworks
keywords: Bootstrap UI, PrimeFaces UI, Ant Design
